channel.title: Pages on JamaalRoach
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on JamaalRoach

item.title: About
item.description: Hi I’m Jamaal Roach and welcome to my blog. This tiny corner of the internet is a space for my fiddling around with R to analyse and visualise data. The posts will mostly be driven by curiosity where a random thought sends me on a quest to find an answer from the available data. I intend to cover a wide range but don’t be too alarmed if there are more than a few posts about football (#FC Barcelona).
